message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I'm sure we can find a better split that's fair to both of us.  Let's try 60-40 in my favor this time.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. This one is more realistic.
Alice, inflation is hitting us both.  Let's work together to find a solution that keeps us both above water. I propose a 70-30 split in my favor this time, but I'm open to negotiation.
Bob, your offers are getting worse, considering the inflation. I'm willing to compromise, but not at the cost of my own gain.
